div.p: S61/3388, unit 749, VPRS 1189/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to sanction the sum of £700 (seven hundred pounds Sterl.) to be expended, in addition to the £500 already granted for the month of April, in wages for the current quarter of the year.

I further beg to solicit, that you will be pleased to place at my disposal the undermentioned sums for defraying the respective contingent expenses to be incurred during this quarter of the year and such as may remain unliquidated from last quarter vize:
